definitions.text: a line determining the limits of an area
a sharp side formed by the intersection of two surfaces of an object
examples: he rounded the edges of the box

definitions.text: the attribute of urgency in tone of voice
examples: his voice had an edge to it
he had an edge on the competition

definitions.text: the outside limit of an object or area or surface; a place farthest away from the center of something
examples: the edge of the leaf is wavy
she sat on the edge of the bed

definitions.text: advance slowly, as if by inches
provide with a border or edge
lie adjacent to another or share a boundary
